titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 3818) to protect investors by enhancing regulation of public auditors, improving corporate governance, overhauling corporate disclosure made pursuant to the securities laws, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Rules.
Motion to Discharge Committee filed by Ms. Carson (IN). Petition No: 107-9.

bill.summary: 7/10/2002--Introduced. Sets forth the rule (closed) for the consideration of H.R. 3818 (comprehensive investor protection).
